suite.description: tests for minimal requirements for metadata statements
name: metadata

test.description: Check that the minimum expected things are found in the server CapabilityStatement
name: metadata

test.description: Check that the minimum expected things are found in the server TerminologyCapabilities
name: term-caps

suite.description: basic tests, setting up for the API tests to come
name: simple-cases

test.description: Expansion containing all the code system
name: simple-expand-all

test.description: Expansion containing only the active codes in the code system
name: simple-expand-active

test.description: Expansion containing only the inactive codes in the code system
name: simple-expand-inactive

test.description: Expansion containing an enumerated set of codes in the code system
name: simple-expand-enum

test.description: Expansion containing an enumerated set of codes in the code system, including invalid codes
name: simple-expand-enum-bad

test.description: Expansion containing a filter on the code system using is-a relationship
name: simple-expand-isa

test.description: Expansion containing a filter on the code system using is-a relationship with paging (tx.fhir.org internal test)
name: simple-expand-isa-o2

test.description: Expansion containing a filter on the code system using is-a relationship with paging (tx.fhir.org internal test)
name: simple-expand-isa-c2

test.description: Expansion containing a filter on the code system using is-a relationship with paging (tx.fhir.org internal test)
name: simple-expand-isa-o2c2

test.description: Expansion containing a filter on the code system using a property value
name: simple-expand-prop

test.description: Expansion containing a filter on the code system using regex on the codes
name: simple-expand-regex

test.description: Expansion containing a filter on the code system using regex on the codes using a regex known to cause a problem on at least one server
name: simple-expand-regex2

test.description: Check that $lookup works (there's not many tests for $lookup because it's not used much by the tools)
name: simple-lookup-1

test.description: Check that $lookup works (there's not many tests for $lookup because it's not used much by the tools)
name: simple-lookup-2

suite.description: Testing out the various expansion parameters that the IG publisher makes use of
name: parameters

test.description: Expand an entire code system, and check that the code system replicates the hierarchy. Note that for all the hierarchical expansions, the flag 'flat' means that the server is not expected to provide a hierarchical expansion
name: parameters-expand-all-hierarchy

test.description: Expand an enumerated value set - no hierarchy in this case
name: parameters-expand-enum-hierarchy

test.description: Expand an is-a value set, and preserve the hierarchy
name: parameters-expand-isa-hierarchy

test.description: expand all the active codes - hierarchy is preserved
name: parameters-expand-all-active

test.description: Expand all the active codes, and specify active codes in a parameter
name: parameters-expand-active-active

test.description: Expand all the codes, including inactive ones, but specify active codes only in a parameter
name: parameters-expand-inactive-active

test.description: Expand an enumerated value set, with active codes only in a parameter
name: parameters-expand-enum-active

test.description: Expand an is-a value set, only the active codes
name: parameters-expand-isa-active

test.description: expand all the active codes, including inactive codes - hierarchy is preserved
name: parameters-expand-all-inactive

suite.description: Testing returning language by request, getting the right designation. see languages.md for an explanation
name: language

suite.description: A series of tests that test display name validation for various permutations of languages. see display/index.md for an explanation
name: language2

test.description: Same request, but with an invalid displayName parameter
name: validation-wrong-de-en-bad

suite.description: Testing proper handling of extensions, which depends on the extension
name: extensions

test.description: Check that a bad system with a version doesn't generate a warning that the version can't be found
name: validation-simple-codeableconcept-bad-version2

suite.description: Testing handling a big code system
name: big

test.description: This test is testing that a server can (a) defend itself against a request that is too big and (b) returns the correct response when it does. The test is termed in terms of 1000 codes, but the actual limit doesn't matter as long as it's... big enough (loose definition)
name: big-echo-no-limit

suite.description: Misc tests based on issues submitted by users
name: other

suite.description: Misc assorted test cases from tho
name: tho

test.description: Test the actual value set directly - v1
name: direct-expand-one

test.description: Test the actual value set directly - v2
name: direct-expand-two

test.description: Test the actual value set indirectly - v1
name: indirect-expand-one

test.description: Test the actual value set indirectly - v2
name: indirect-expand-two

test.description: Test the actual value set indirectly - versionless
name: indirect-expand-zero

test.description: Test the actual value set indirectly - versionless, and specify a version
name: indirect-expand-zero-pinned

test.description: Test the actual value set indirectly - versionless, and specify a version that doesn't exist
name: indirect-expand-zero-pinned-wrong

suite.description: These are tx.fhir.org specific tests. There's no expectation that other servers will pass these tests, and they are not executed by default. (other servers can, but they depend on other set up not controlled by the tests
name: tx.fhir.org
